Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 6 -- 7 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Bienville Parish Fire Protection District No. 6, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a seven (7) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $443,500 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or purchasing fire protection equipment and facilities and emergency medical service facilities, vehicles and equipment for the District, including payment of salaries in connection therewith?
